item.title: Building a CRUD API in Go
item.description: I’ve been looking for an oppurtunity to pick up Go lately and with a break in my studies recently it was a good oppurtunity to give it a try. Go is really well suited to a web service like this as it offers a simple and friendly syntax along with high performance and the ability to compile to a single binary file. Go also offers easily accesible concurrency via goroutines.
